SELECT * from( SELECT rb.ID, rm.USERNAME, rb.NAME, rb.ACCOUNT, rb.TIME_LIMIT, CONTRACT_NO, rb.BORROWTYPE, rb.APR, rb.STATUS, rb.ACCOUNT_YES, rb.ADDTIME, rb.TENDER_TIMES, ROUND(rb.ACCOUNT_YES/rb.ACCOUNT,2) SCHEDULE, rb.STYLE, rb.pledge_type, rb.timing_borrow_time, rb.publish_time, rm.HEADIMG HEADIMG, rb.BID_PASSWORD, rb.BORROW_USE BORROW_USE, rb.credit_rating, rb.AREA_TYPE FROM ROCKY_BORROW rb LEFT JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER rm ON rb.USER_ID = rm.ID where (rb.is_custody is null or rb.is_custody=0) and rb.TIMING_BORROW_TIME > unix_timestamp(now()) and rb.STATUS=1 and rb.apprstatus=2 limit 0,2 UNION ALL
SELECT rb.ID, rm.USERNAME, rb.NAME, rb.ACCOUNT, rb.TIME_LIMIT, CONTRACT_NO, rb.BORROWTYPE, rb.APR, rb.STATUS, rb.ACCOUNT_YES, rb.ADDTIME, rb.TENDER_TIMES, ROUND(rb.ACCOUNT_YES/rb.ACCOUNT,2) SCHEDULE, rb.STYLE, rb.pledge_type, rb.timing_borrow_time, rb.publish_time, rm.HEADIMG HEADIMG, rb.BID_PASSWORD, rb.BORROW_USE BORROW_USE, rb.credit_rating, rb.AREA_TYPE FROM ROCKY_BORROW rb LEFT JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER rm ON rb.USER_ID = rm.ID where (rb.is_custody is null or rb.is_custody=0) and rb.STATUS=2 ) t ORDER BY status asc,field(borrowtype,2,5,1,4,3),apr desc,TIMING_BORROW_TIME asc,id desc
select COUNT(id) as bidNum,MIN(apr) as minApr,MAX(apr) as maxApr from rocky_borrow where STATUS=2
select COUNT(rb.id) as num from rocky_borrow rb where rb.STATUS=2 or (rb.TIMING_BORROW_TIME > unix_timestamp(now()) and rb.STATUS=1 and rb.apprstatus=2 and (rb.is_custody is null or rb.is_custody=0))
